data.title: Z increment
data.solution:
import re

n, a = [int(i) for i in input().split()]
for i in range(n):
    line = input()
    pattern='\\bZ(\d+)'
    print(re.sub(pattern,lambda exp:"Z{}".format(int(exp.groups()[0]) + a), line))
data.statement:
Increment by [[a]] all positive numbers following the character <<Z>> for each line of the input.
Some lines may not contain any character <<Z>>. Increment only if <<Z>> is not following any other character.

<<Example:>> for [[a]] = 3
Z10 => Z13
ABCZ1 => ABCZ1 (no changes because Z is following another character)
AB Z0 Z30 => AB Z3 Z33
ABC => ABC

testCases.title: Test 3
testCases.testIn:
4 10
Do not fall for this Z 100
Only for Z0 not for A0 B0...
Not for Zoo either
But do not forget Z15.
testCases.testOut:
Do not fall for this Z 100
Only for Z10 not for A0 B0...
Not for Zoo either
But do not forget Z25.

testCases.title: Validator 3
testCases.testIn:
4 1
Do not fall for this Z 100
Only for Z0 not for A0 B0...
Not for Zoo either
But do not forget Z15.
testCases.testOut:
Do not fall for this Z 100
Only for Z1 not for A0 B0...
Not for Zoo either
But do not forget Z16.

testCases.title: Test 4
testCases.testIn:
5 5
Z
Z10 useless text
useless text Z20
useless text Z30 useless text;
useless text
testCases.testOut:
Z
Z15 useless text
useless text Z25
useless text Z35 useless text;
useless text

testCases.title: Validator 4
testCases.testIn:

Z
Z10 text
text Z20
text Z30 text;
text
testCases.testOut:
Z
Z15 text
text Z25
text Z35 text;
text

data.stubGenerator:
read n:int a:int
loop n read line:string(255)
loop n write incremented line
data.inputDescription:
<<Line 1:>> An integer [[n]], for the number of line. And an integer [[a]], the increment value to use.
<<Next [[n]] lines:>> lines which may contain characters <<Z>> followed by numbers
data.outputDescription: <<[[n]] lines>> with incremented number by [[a]]. Only positive numbers following the character <<Z>> should be incremented

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

Increment by a all positive numbers following the character Z for each line of the input.
Some lines may not contain any character Z. Increment only if Z is not following any other character.

Example: for a = 3
Z10 => Z13
ABCZ1 => ABCZ1 (no changes because Z is following another character)
AB Z0 Z30 => AB Z3 Z33
ABC => ABC
Input
Line 1: An integer n, for the number of line. And an integer a, the increment value to use.
Next n lines: lines which may contain characters Z followed by numbers
Output
n lines with incremented number by a. Only positive numbers following the character Z should be incremented
Constraints
1 ≤ n ≤ 100
Example
Input
3 2
Z1
Z2
Z3xxxx
Output
Z3
Z4
Z5xxxx
